# Lexical Versioning Test Fixtures
# Various lexical formats for fallback testing

# Simple strings
v1.0.0
v1.0.1
v2.0.0
version-1.0
release-2024

# With whitespace
  v1.0.0
v1.0.0
v1.0.0

# Case variations
v1.0.0
V1.0.0
v1.0.0-alpha
V1.0.0-ALPHA

# Special characters
v1.0.0-alpha.1
v1.0.0+build.123
v1.0.0-rc.1+build.456
version_1.0.0
version-1.0.0

# Unicode characters
v1.0.0
v1.0.0ü
v1.0.0-beta
v1.0.0-ßeta

# Numbers and letters mixed
v1.0a
v1.0b
v1.0.0a
v1.0.0b

# Different lengths
v1
v1.0
v1.0.0
v1.0.0.0

# Real-world examples
main
develop
feature-branch
hotfix-1.2.3
tag-2024-09-15
